sections.heading: PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING CONSENT
sections.text:
[COMPANY_NAME] would like to process your personal data for the purposes set out below.

Please read the following carefully and indicate your consent by ticking the appropriate boxes.

sections.heading: CONSENT REQUESTS
sections.text:
Please tick the boxes below to indicate your consent:

☐ I consent to [COMPANY_NAME] processing my personal data ([DATA_TYPES - e.g., name, email address, phone number]) for the purpose of [PURPOSE_1 - e.g., sending me marketing communications about products and services].

☐ I consent to [COMPANY_NAME] sharing my personal data with [THIRD_PARTIES - e.g., our marketing partners] for the purpose of [PURPOSE_2 - e.g., sending me relevant offers from selected partners].

☐ I consent to [COMPANY_NAME] processing my special category data ([SPECIAL_DATA - e.g., health information]) for the purpose of [PURPOSE_3 - e.g., providing tailored health and wellness recommendations].

☐ I consent to receiving marketing communications by:
   ☐ Email
   ☐ SMS/Text message  
   ☐ Phone
   ☐ Post

sections.heading: IMPORTANT INFORMATION
sections.text:
**You can withdraw your consent at any time** by:
- Emailing [WITHDRAWAL_EMAIL]
- Clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails
- Calling [PHONE_NUMBER]
- Writing to [ADDRESS]

**Your rights:**
- Withdrawing consent does not affect the lawfulness of processing before withdrawal
- You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict, port, and object to processing of your personal data
- You have the right to complain to the ICO: ico.org.uk or 0303 123 1113

**Further information:**
For full details of how we process your personal data, please see our Privacy Notice at [PRIVACY_NOTICE_URL].

sections.heading: SIGNATURE
sections.text:
I confirm that:
- I have read and understood this consent form
- My consent is freely given
- I understand I can withdraw my consent at any time

Signature: _______________________
Name: _______________________
Date: _______________________

compliance_checklist: Consent is freely given (no bundled consent, no detriment if refused)
Link to full privacy notice provided
Records of consent maintained (who, when, what, how)
Age verification for children (<13 years requires parental consent)
Regular review of consent (refresh if stale)
